dublin_core.dcvalue: Using the Internet and telemedicine video equipment to coordinate medical and health care will be commonplace in the near future Already physicians can assist and perform surgery in remote sites via robotics and review radiological films and pathology slides This article provides a current view of e health and telemedicine and suggests websites for you to explore
Caring : National Association for Home Care magazine
Telemedicine. The impact of the Web And e-health management.
